General.Name: Peach Property Group AG
General.Description: Peach Property Group AG engages in investment and development of residential real estate properties in Germany and Switzerland. It is involved in the property acquisition, location evaluation, asset management, and sale or letting of properties. The company's property portfolio comprises residential units and commercial properties in Germany and the greater Zurich region. Peach Property Group AG is headquartered in Zürich, Switzerland.

6.Name: Mr. Marc  Sesterhenn
6.Title: MD of German Asset Companies and Head of Asset & Property Management
